properties.sfomuseum:description: Handwritten letter from Harold M. Bixby to his wife, Debby Bixby, dated December 17, [1933]; includes description of the outcome of the inquiry into the accident at Zhoushan Island; mentions [William L.] Bond and [Max] Polin, [Robert] Gast, [William] Grooch, George Rumrill, Mr. Dai [Enki], Colonel [John] Jouett, [Floyd] Nelson, Phil Love.
properties.wof:name: correspondence: Harold M. Bixby to Debby Bixby
